00004 #ifndef __LINUX_VME_IO_H
00005 #define __LINUX_VME_IO_H

00007 #include <linux/ioctl.h>
00008 
00009 /* ioctl()'s for the VME-Access */
00010 /* first start with the control device (/dev/vme_ctl) which is used
00011    for operations affecting the entire bus, such as resetting, setting
00012    arbitration and so on */
00013 
00014 /* execute a VMEBus reset */
00015 #define VMECTL_RESET            _IO('x', 0)
00016 
00017 /* get/set VMEBus time out, in usec */
00018 #define VMECTL_GETVMETO         _IOR('x', 1, int)
00019 #define VMECTL_SETVMETO         _IOW('x', 1, int)

00049   char prgdataam;

00073 struct DMA_chainblock_type {
00074   unsigned int vme_address;             /* the VME-Address of the block */
00075   size_t n_bytes;                       /* the size of the block */
00076   int          offset;                  /* The offset in bytes from the 
00077                                            start of the buffer */
00078   struct vme_mapping_ctrl mapping;      /* the access mode for the VME bus */
00079   int          write;                   /* != 0 for writing to VME,
00080                                            0 for reading from VME */
00081 };
00082

00088 #define VMEDMA_CLEARBLOCKS _IO('x',10)
